comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Adalbert_of_Prussia_(1884%E2%80%931948) "Prince Adalbert of Prussia (Adalbert Ferdinand Berengar Viktor) (14 July 1884 in Potsdam, Germany – 22 September 1948 in La Tour de Peilz, Switzerland) was a son of Kaiser Wilhelm II of Germany by his first wife, Princess Augusta Viktoria of Schleswig-Holstein."

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: swanq: thank you for the additional information.  We will update the record.
